indicator_name: Implementation of standard accounting tools to monitor the economic and environmental aspects of tourism sustainability
page_content:
**Non-statistical indicator**

We have identified the following plan relevant to this indicator -

[Liverpool City Region Visitor Economy Strategy and Destination Management Plan](https://www.liverpoollep.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Liverpool-City-Region-DMP-2018-edit_v2.pdf) - An Action Plan for Jobs and Growth in Liverpool City Region, with reference to sustainability and the promotion of local culture and products.

SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 12.b: Develop and implement tools to monitor sustainable development impacts for sustainable tourism that creates jobs and promotes local culture and products
